issue_summary: Remove history of test bookings (before go live) - at the moment not possible
issue_description: Before enabling a property in the live environment, the Onboarding Team performs a series of test bookings with the client to verify that the reservation flow functions smoothly and meets expectations.In order to carry out these tests, the Booking Engine must be switched to live mode, as there is currently no option to mark a reservation as a TEST booking. As a result, these test bookings are treated as regular reservations. Even if they are cancelled, they remain visible in the booking listing and may be included in monthly invoicing, potentially leading to confusion and inaccuracies.Example of a property currently in the onboarding process with test reservations: ID 12778We propose introducing a functionality, available for internal use only (e.g., via Suite or the Support Tool), that would allow authorised users to remove or exclude these test bookings from the history once testing is complete and before the property goes live.
